title: Definitions
context: [ยง524-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Facility&rdquo; means a multi-unit residential building, including all operations associated therewith, used for retirement purposes in which living units are leased for a term to last for the lifetime of the lessee and the lessee&rsquo;s surviving spouse, where the living unit is used as a residence by the lessee and the lessee&rsquo;s surviving spouse, and where the living unit reverts back to the lessor upon the death of the lessee and the lessee&rsquo;s surviving spouse. &ldquo;Lessee&rdquo; means the person or persons leasing a living unit in a facility.
